game.name: Edge Of Dread
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A simple job at the mayor’s mansion turns deadly. With no checkpoints, every run is an escape attempt through shifting puzzles and locked corridors. Collect tools, create distractions and hide from the relentless monster. Uncover the truth and find one of multiple exits before a mistake ends the run
